headline: Jamf's RapidIdentity Selected for Major Ohio Higher Education Consortium Contract
summary: HOUSTON, October 28, 2025--Jamf (NASDAQ: JAMF), the standard in managing and securing Apple at work, today announced that RapidIdentity from Jamf has been awarded a transformative contract with The Inter-University Council Purchasing Group (IUC-PG) of Ohio. RapidIdentity has been selected as one of two vetted identity and access management platforms contractually available for all 86 member institutions of this prestigious consortium.
